messages.subject: fanarts up
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, some of you have already seen this.  Feel free to link, grab in your databases or the main shinsengumi pages.  Just point back to my devart acct. please!
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, some of you have already seen this. Feel free to link, grab in your databases or the main shinsengumi pages. Just point back to my devart acct. please! LOL

But from PMK:

And semi-Mibushigiden/PMK (boy, this one I can NOT explain)

(S: scuttling back to lurkerdom at s-girl.deviantart.com)

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Video Files on Streamload for download
messages.msgSnippet: Hey everyone, I ve put up various files on Streamload for you all to download. These will be up for about 1 week. http://www.streamload.com/okitasoujissg
messages.messageBody:
Hey everyone, I've put up various files on Streamload for you all to download. These will be up for about 1 week.
